Package problem01

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem01.Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car, LuxuryCar, Truck, Van
    public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    CS5004 Spring2022 Jin Young Park hw2 Vehicle.java Vehicle is parent class of Car, LuxuryCar, Truck, and Van. It stores information about the vehicle in terms of vehicle reservation system. All vehicles have a maximum occupancy, daily price, whether it requires a special Driver's License, whether it can be picked up and dropped off at different locations, and the number of days the vehicle is booked.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle​(int maxOccupancy,
               java.lang.Double dailyPrice,
               boolean needSpecialDriverLicense,
               boolean allowDifferentLoc,
               int numOfBookedDays)
        throws IllegalDailyPriceException,
               IllegalNumberOfDaysException
        Constructor of Vehicle class
        Parameters:
        maxOccupancy - - representing the maximum occupancy of a vehicle, as Integer
        dailyPrice - - representing the daily price for renting the vehicle, as Double
        needSpecialDriverLicense - - representing whether it requires special driver's license to drive this vehicle, as Boolean
        allowDifferentLoc - - representing whether the vehicle can be picked up and dropped off at different locations, as Boolean
        numOfBookedDays - - representing the number of days that the vehicle is booked, as Integer
        Throws:
        IllegalDailyPriceException - - If the inputs of the daily price is below 0, then it throws exception since it is invalid input
        IllegalNumberOfDaysException - - If the inputs of the number of days is below 0, then it throws exception since it is invalid input

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Checks if the vehicle is available to book
        Returns:
        true if the vehicle is not booked, false if it is booked.

      • bookVehicle

        public boolean bookVehicle​(int numOfDaysWanted,
                           int numOfPassengers,
                           java.lang.String pickUpLoc,
                           java.lang.String dropOffLoc,
                           boolean haveSpecialDL)
                    throws IllegalNumberOfDaysException
        Books the vehicle after checking multiple conditions that the vehicle requires.
        Parameters:
        numOfDaysWanted - - the number of days the person wants to book the vehicle for, as Integer
        numOfPassengers - - the number of passengers that will be in the vehicle, as Integer
        pickUpLoc - - the location the person will pick up the car, as String
        dropOffLoc - - the location the person will drop off the car, as String
        haveSpecialDL - - whether the person has a special driver's license, as boolean
        Returns:
        true if the vehicle is booked, false if the vehicle could not be booked
        Throws:
        IllegalNumberOfDaysException - if the given number of days wanted is below 0, it throws exception.
